CRC1451-INF-palmer-penguins-demo-dataset: The goal of palmerpenguins is to provide a great dataset for data exploration and visualization, as an alternative to iris. Data were collected and made available by Dr. Kristen Gorman and the Palmer Station, Antarctica LTER, a member of the Long Term Ecological Research Network.
